summary: A lonely journalist in some West European country has a vision about the princess of his city who lived in XII century.
cast: Nikolay Eryomenko|Natalya Trubnikova|Vladimir Zeldin|Vladimir Etush|Lyudmila Vlasova|Alexander Godunov|Lyubov Polishchuk|Igor Yasulovich|Marina Nudga|Emmanuil Geller|Mikhail Kokshenov|Vladimir Soshalsky|Tatyana Antsiferova

title: 31 iyunya
